ygData.subject: Re: Specialization
ygData.msgSnippet: My specialize evocation is the same as my evocation.  I am lvl 27.  My two skills are maxed at 140.  All my other specialize skills are at 50, except for
ygData.messageBody:
My specialize evocation is the same as my evocation. I am lvl 27. My two
skills are maxed at 140. All my other specialize skills are at 50, except for
conjuration.

Destry Dreamwalker
Fennin Ro

Alan Charity wrote:

> From: "Alan Charity" <acharity@...>
>
> I just logged on at lunch to kill a few Bandits and noticed that my
> Specialize Evocation went to 103.
> I do know that my Evocation is maxed at 125.
>
> I was under the impression that the Primary specialization would stop at 100
> and the rest at 50. My other Specialized abilities have not reached 50 yet
> so I am interested to see what happens.
>
> Anyone else notice this or am I just lucky?
>
> Algernon of Karana
> 24th Level Wizard
>
